department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: man seated on a low bed; two women seated at foot of bed; plants and two birds in background; birds along cornice in URC; figures and bed stippled-may have been used as cartoon; mounted on backing sheet; matted
inscription:
Inscription Stamp and Sticker

LRC on back, stamped in purple: [RANGOPAL VIUAYVARGYA/ OF JAIPUR/ DRAWING/ NO._]; ULC on back, in pencil: [P1636] LRC on back, on sticker: [(M1264/ LE/ AEE]]
title: Prince with Courtesan and Attendant
